pages.text: $(li)Spiders are small hostile creatures with the hability to climb walls that can be found over the Overworld at night or in places with low lighting.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/string)Strings$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/spider_eye)Spider Eyes$(/l) upon death.
